metadata.dc:author: Caro-Patón, A
Atienza Sánchez, R
López Represa, C
Gil-Simón, P
Barrio Andrés, J
Julián Gómez, L
metadata.dc:description: Extraintestinal respiratory manifestations in inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) are rare. We present a case of bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia (BOOP) in a patient with Crohn s disease, with clinical remission with no drug therapy.
metadata.dc:title: Bronquiolitis obliterante con neumonía organizada y enfermedad de Crohn.
[Bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia and Crohn's disease].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
